output:
Verse 1
I got the ball, it's bouncing off the floor, 
I'm invincible, 'cause I don't take no more,
I'm fast, quick and got the necessary skill, 
Bounce off the wall, and over the hill.

Chorus
I don't know why I love this basketball,
I just do, I'm sure I won't fall, 
Let's get this ball rolling,
'Cause I just love balling.

Verse 2
I'm dribbling and weaving my way to the lane, 
Making these defensive players look lame,
Got a crossover, a spin and a shot,
Dunking the ball and raising the roof.

Chorus
I don't know why I love this basketball,
I just do, I'm sure I won't fall, 
Let's get this ball rolling,
'Cause I just love balling.

Verse 3
This game has given me wings to fly,
Keep bouncing and make sure I get high,
If you want to beat me you got no chance,
I'm on my way to another slam dunk. 

Chorus
I don't know why I love this basketball,
I just do, I'm sure I won't fall, 
Let's get this ball rolling,
'Cause I just love balling.

Outro
This is basketball, a sport we all know,
Bringing heart and soul to every show, 
Let's keep the ball flying,
And make the court crying.
